plot: A group of 4 kids try to solve mysteries. The name of the gang is based on a piece of clothing: knickerbockers.
plot_en: A group of 4 kids try to solve mysteries. The name of the gang is based on a piece of clothing: knickerbockers.
plot_es: A group of 4 kids try to solve mysteries. The name of the gang is based on a piece of clothing: knickerbockers.
title: Die Knickerbocker-Bande
